title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added a bug fix entry to release notes for GitHub Enterprise Server versions 3.14 and 3.15.
Fixes an issue where images failed to migrate properly during repository imports using GitHub Enterprise Importer (GEI) from GitHub Enterprise Server.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added a bug fix entry to release notes for GitHub Enterprise Server versions 3.14 and 3.15.  
- Fixes an issue where images failed to migrate properly during repository imports using GitHub Enterprise Importer (GEI) from GitHub Enterprise Server.  

### Title  
Document GEI image migration fix in release notes
